io.mosip.registration.tpm.spi

Class TPMUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mosip.registration.tpm.spi.TPMUtil

  • public class TPMUtil
extends Object
    The TPM Utility class to access the following TPM services:
    1. TPM Signature and Validation
    2. Get Public Key used for Signing
    3. Asymmetric Encryption and Decryption
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Balaji Sridharan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] asymmetricDecrypt(byte[] encryptedData)
      Decrypts the encrypted data by asymmetric algorithm using the TPM
      static byte[] asymmetricEncrypt(byte[] dataToEncrypt)
      Encrypts the input data by asymmetric algorithm using the TPM
      static void closeTPMInstance()
      Closes the Tpm instance
      static byte[] getSigningPublicPart()
      Gets the public part of the signing key

      static byte[] signData(byte[] dataToSign)
      Signs the input data by private key provided from the Tpm
      static boolean validateSignature(byte[] signature, byte[] actualData, byte[] publicPart)
      Validates the signed data against the actual data using the public part.
      The validation requires TSS library but TPM is not required.

    • Method Detail

      • signData

        public static byte[] signData(byte[] dataToSign)
        Signs the input data by private key provided from the Tpm
        Parameters:
        dataToSign - the byte array of the data to be signed
        Returns:
        the data signed by the TPM

      • validateSignature

        public static boolean validateSignature(byte[] signature,
                                        byte[] actualData,
                                        byte[] publicPart)
        Validates the signed data against the actual data using the public part.
        The validation requires TSS library but TPM is not required.
        Parameters:
        signature - the signature provided by the Tpm
        actualData - the actual data against which singed data had to be verified
        publicPart - the public part of the key which is used for signing the data
        Returns:
        the response of the signed data validation against actual data

      • asymmetricEncrypt

        public static byte[] asymmetricEncrypt(byte[] dataToEncrypt)
        Encrypts the input data by asymmetric algorithm using the TPM
        Parameters:
        dataToEncrypt - the data to be encrypted
        Returns:
        the encrypted data in bytes

      • asymmetricDecrypt

        public static byte[] asymmetricDecrypt(byte[] encryptedData)
        Decrypts the encrypted data by asymmetric algorithm using the TPM
        Parameters:
        encryptedData - the encrypted data
        Returns:
        the decrypted data

      • getSigningPublicPart

        public static byte[] getSigningPublicPart()
        Gets the public part of the signing key
        Returns:
        the public part of the signing key

      • getTPMInstance

        Returns:
        the Tpm instance

      • closeTPMInstance

        public static void closeTPMInstance()
                             throws RegBaseCheckedException
        Closes the Tpm instance
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - exception while closing the Tpm
